metadata.title: CVE-2023-52356 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A segment fault (SEGV) flaw was found in libtiff that could be triggered bypassing a crafted tiff file to the TIFFReadRGBATileExt() API. This flawallows a remote attacker to cause a heap-buffer overflow, leading to adenial of service.

criterions.comment: tiff package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
